channel.title: [Class Suggestion]
channel.description:
Loof (Unseen) - Fool but converted to the Unseen
Day Ability 1: Troll Box(the same as fool's trollbox)
Night Ability 1: Firecrackers(Same as surpise for the fool)Infinte uses
Night Ability 2: Shove a Firwork up somebody's butt and it explodes them. Two uses, kills unless healed.Goes through Night Immunity(optional)but not Reaper's.
Lore: Umm
Comments: Basicly the same as Fool but spelled backwards and is unseen
